bibl.title: A Deed of Exchange from Aphrodito.
bibl.note: P. Colon. Inv. 1376 is the left part of the deed of exchange edited as P. Michael. 51. Aphrodito, ca. 514-547 (most likely before 538).

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Michael. 51 + P. Colon. Inv. 1376 = P. Thomas 28
KOENEN Ludwig, A Deed of Exchange from Aphrodito.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 235-249, 2 figg. et pl. 22.
P. Colon. Inv. 1376 is the left part of the deed of exchange edited as P. Michael. 51. Aphrodito, ca. 514-547 (most likely before 538).
